hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ata said:"I head Ibn Abbas sya: 'Usmah bin Zaid told me that the Prophet entered the YHouse, and supplicated in all its corner, but he did not pray inside unitl he came out; when he came out he prayed two Rakahs in front of the Kabah

chapter.ara-name: باب وَضْعِ الصَّدْرِ وَالْوَجْهِ عَلَى مَا اسْتَقْبَلَ مِنْ دُبُرِ الْكَعْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Placing One's Face and Chest On The Back Wall Of The Kabah
